metadata.title: CVE-2020-25559 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: gnuplot 5.5 is affected by double free when executing print_set_output.This may result in context-dependent arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: gnuplot: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
